ModMetaData.name: Just Another Music Pack
ModMetaData.author: dammitpogi
ModMetaData.description:
This mod replaces all VANILLA MUSIC in the game. This mod is save-compatible and should be placed after RimThemes if that exists in your load order.
Music from the following mods: Medicine for the Colonies, Music of the Rim, the Neotokyo Music Pack, the P-Music Pack, the RimEVE, RimFTL, and the Rimwave Music Packs.
